text: Temane (musa a.Sa.) Pharamavyum ke allaha no adesa che ke te gaya kama karavavali, hala calavavavali ane khetarone pani pivadavanari nahi, te tandurasta ane khoda vagarani che, te'o'e kahyum have tame satya batavi didhum, te'o adesanum palana karavavala na hata, parantu tene man'yum ane te gaya kurabana kari didhi
